introduction:
My name is Denis Kotnik. I hold a master's degree in machine learning from the Faculty of Computer and Information Science at the University of Ljubljana. I am a trainee in psychodynamic psychotherapy, and I am also interested in psychoanalysis and philosophy.

I am drawn to thinkers such as Socrates, Ren√© Descartes, Karl Marx, Sigmund Freud, Jacques Lacan, Alain Badiou, and others.
